46-294.05.Rules and regulations.

The Chief Water Officer of the Department of Water, Energy, and Environment may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out sections 46-290 to 46-294.04.

SourceLaws 2004, LB 962, ยง 25;Laws 2025, LB317, ยง 117.Operative Date: July 1, 2025
